overclocks.name: Compact Shells
overclocks.description: You can carry a few more of these compact shells in your pockets, and they are a bit faster to reload with.

overclocks.name: Special Powder
overclocks.description: Less like gunpowder and more like rocket fuel, this mixture gives a hell of a kick that you can use to get places.

overclocks.name: Stuffed Shells
overclocks.description: With a bit of patience and some luck, you can get one more pellet and a few more grains of powder into each shell without affecting the gun's performance or losing an eye in the process.

overclocks.name: Shaped Shells
overclocks.description: Specially shaped shells result in a tighter shot, but the number of pellets is reduced.

overclocks.name: Double Barrel
overclocks.description: Unload both barrels at once, no regrets. As an added bonus, the simultaneous firing of both shells has an amplifying effect on the blast wave.

overclocks.name: Jumbo Shells
overclocks.description: These large shells pack a lot more charge for a big increase in damage, but they also take up more space so total ammo is limited.
